scripts.start: npm run init-db && npx nodemon --exec babel-node server.js
scripts.sequelize-skeleton: npx sequelize init:models; npx sequelize init:config
scripts.init-db: cd $npm_package_configs_mysqlbin && echo 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS leo_graphql_persons; CREATE DATABASE leo_graphql_persons CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci' | ./mysql -u $npm_package_configs_user -p$npm_package_configs_pass && cd -
